Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of Quercetin in Ropivacaine-Induced Neurotoxicity

Trial_Design.evidence: This randomised controlled trial was conducted using SH-SY5Y cells.

Intervention.evidence: Quer significantly reduced Rop-induced viability inhibition and apoptosis in SH-SY5Y cells in a dose-dependent manner.

Objective.evidence: This study evaluates Quer’s efficacy in reducing Rop-induced neurotoxicity.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Quer significantly reduced Rop-induced viability inhibition and apoptosis in SH-SY5Y cells in a dose-dependent manner.
